New Records: The Chicago Bulls tied their franchise record with 25 three-pointers made in the game
Key Match Events: The Bulls erased a 20-point deficit in the second half
Bench players Jalen Smith, Julian Phillips, Lonzo Ball, and Ayo Dosunmu contributed significantly to the comeback
Post-Match Reflections: Bulls head coach Billy Donovan praised the bench's performance and the team's ability to respond after a halftime deficit
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bulls have a young roster and are aiming for a strong start to the season
Lonzo Ball highlighted the importance of three-point shooting and the team's depth
